alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 7:42PM CST until March 08 at 6:20PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Barry, Christian, Greene, Stone and Webster. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 741 PM CST, River gauge reports indicated that flooding continued along the James River and Flat Creek from the heavy rain that occurred Thursday afternoon into Friday morning. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area and will continue through the overnight hours into Saturday morning. - This includes the following low water crossings... Little Crane Creek at Old Wire Road, Green Valley Creek at Holder RD, Rockhouse Creek at Farm Road 2145, Flat Creek at Highway C, Wilson`s Creek at Old Limey Road, Parchcorn Creek at Smyrna Road and Flat Creek at Highway U. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Southeastern Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Cassville, Rogersville, Clever, Crane, Reeds Spring, Galena, Fremont Hills, Butterfield, Mccord Bend, Hurley, Elsey, Ponce de Leon, Boaz, Wheelerville, Cape Fair, Jenkins, Mcdowell, Northview and Table Rock Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
